original_title: The Land of Canaan: The Canaanites
overview: In this introductory lecture by Dr. William J. Neidinger we examine three topics: 1) the definitions, paradigms, and parameters we will use in examining the racial and religious history of the Land of Canaan; 2) the geography of the Middle East; and 3) a brief look at the Canaanites.
title: The Land of Canaan: The Canaanites
